<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/a853089479b60b829bab1c4a0a737a073415f8a7|patch 8.2.2488: json_encode() gives generic argument error>
patch 8.2.2488: json_encode() gives generic argument error

Problem:    json_encode() gives generic argument error.
Solution:   Mention the type that can't be encoded. (issue #7802)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.2488: json_encode() gives generic argument error 路 vim/vim@a853089
attachments.title: patch 8.2.2488: json_encode() gives generic argument error 路 vim/vim@a853089
attachments.text: Problem: json_encode() gives generic argument error. Solution: Mention the type that can't be encoded. (issue #7802)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/4549dad874244fe933b969e4ac0b41923ee70dc3|patch 8.2.2487: terminal shows garbage after double-wide character>
patch 8.2.2487: terminal shows garbage after double-wide character

Problem:    Terminal shows garbage after double-wide character with a
            combining character. (Kyoichiro Yamada)
Solution:   Libvterm: do not add the width of the combining character to the
            glyph width. (closes #7801)
